CLINICAL LABORATORY REPORT

Patient: Bob Johnson
Date: 2024-02-20

VITAL SIGNS:
BP: 135/88 mmHg
Pulse: 78 bpm

BLOOD TESTS:
Glucose: 105 mg/dL
Cholesterol: 210 mg/dL
LDL: 110 mg/dL
HDL: 42 mg/dL
Triglycerides: 155 mg/dL

COMPLETE BLOOD COUNT:
Hb: 13.8 g/dL
White Blood Cell Count: 10.5 ×10³/μL
Platelet: 220 ×10³/μL

RENAL PANEL:
Creatinine: 1.1 mg/dL

NOTES:
Some parameters slightly elevated. Recommend lifestyle modifications and follow-up in 3 months.
